name: Too Good To Go
goal:
Too Good To Go ApS is an online application that enables stores such as bakeries, supermarkets and restaurants to sell surplus food, that would have otherwise been thrown away at the end of the day, to hungry consumers.
Founded in Copenhagen early 2016, we are now present in 14 different countries around Europe and we continue to rapidly expand. We have so far saved over 20 million meals to a community of 13 million Waste Warriors across 30.000 partners.

Our mission is clear: we want to inspire and empower everyone to take action against food waste. Most recently we have set ambitious targets to have an even wider impact by building the Movement Against Food Waste. Our intention is to use our position as the largest global B2C food waste business to help and further reduce food waste along the supply chain.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
European Green Deal
Circular Economy
Farm-to-fork strategy
